amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide full funding for the payments in lieu of taxes (PILT) program, and Fish and Wildlife Services Refuge Revenue Sharing program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 106-612 to require full funding of the amounts authorized for PILT and Refuge Revenue Sharing, if amounts otherwise made available in the bill are insufficient.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radanovich amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 273 (Roll no. 161).
